Text.Name: MainUIWorldTime
Text.Title: World Clock
Text.Desc: Time of the world, the numbers of which increase as the game progresses.
Text.Tips: Right-click to open the comment panel of [color=#D06508]World Clock[/color].

Text.Name: MainUIWeather
Text.Notes: Only used to show tips at the entrance of comment panel of Weather.
Text.Tips: Right-click to open the comment panel of [color=#D06508]Weather[/color].

Text.Name: MainUISectFengShui
Text.Notes: Comment Panel of Sect's Feng Shui
Text.Title: Sect's Feng Shui
Text.Desc: The Feng Shui of a sect.
Text.Tips: Right-click to open the comment panel of [color=#D06508]Sect's Feng Shui[/color].

Text.Name: MainUIRoomFengShui
Text.Notes: Comment Panel of Room's Feng Shui
Text.Title: Room's Feng Shui
Text.Desc: The Feng Shui of a room.
Text.Tips: Right-click to open the comment panel of [color=#D06508]Room's Feng Shui[/color].

Text.Name: MainUILingShi
Text.Title: Spirit Stone Coin
Text.Desc: Universally accepted commodity that can be used as currency to trade with others.
Text.Tips: Right-click to open the comment panel of [color=#D06508]Spirit Stone[/color].

Text.Name: MainUIInfluence
Text.Title: Influence
Text.Desc: The influence of your sect in the mortal world, can be used to expand your power in the mortal world.
Text.Tips: Right-click to open the comment panel of [color=#D06508]Influence[/color].

Text.Name: MainUIWuXingGraph
Text.Notes: Comment Panel of Five Element Diagram
Text.Title: Five Element Diagram
Text.Desc: The Five Element Diagram shows each of the connective and counteractive relationships between the five elements - Metal, Wood, Water, Fire and Earth.
Text.Tips: Right-click to open the comment panel of [color=#D06508]Five Element Diagram[/color].
